Minneapolis.Willard-Hay, Minneapolis: Willard-Hay is a neighborhood within the larger Near North community on the north side of Minneapolis. The boundaries are roughly Olson Highway on the south, Penn Avenue on the east, (though a small portion of the neighborhood is northeast of Penn and Plymouth) Broadway Avenue on the northeast and Theodore Wirth Park on the west. The neighborhood is often known as Willard-Homewood by residents; the portion south of Plymouth is Homewood.
